title: report for stalk-ish behavior?
body: my sister met a dude on twisted he was  kind and a good player and he started acting weird.. and asked her qeustions about age location and if she had any other family members living with her. so as  expected she blocked him imediatly but he made 2 other accs and friended her from those one called Your my queen and the other she never told me the name of please tell me if their is any sort of way to report this shit because i dont know any support site that actauly helps for stuff like this league related

replies.body: That's not okay what so ever! First, if you and your family don't feel safe contact the local authorities. Second, if you have screenshots submit them over to our [Player Behavior Team](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), so we can investigate this player further and work to stop this. So sorry this happened to your Sister.

Please contact the local authorities and at least make a report. The guy could be a known sex offender, have previous arrests, have a shady history and more. As someone who used to deal with really bad cyber bullying because of my sexuality, do not take anything for chance. People can be whoever they want behind a computer screen. If he is willing to act this way towards your sister than he has no problem doing it to someone else. If anything call your local authorities for peace of mind.
